  • Constructor Details

    • Kinematic

      public Kinematic​(float X, float Y, float orientation)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      X - - float - the x position of the character
      Y - -float - the y position of the character
      orientation - - float - the orientation (which way character is moving/looking)

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(SteeringOutput steering, float maxSpeed, float time)
      Update method that updates all the variables based on the steering movement and the max speed. Time is used to scale the movement based how much time is passed for movement
      Parameters:
      steering - - SteeringOutput - gathered from a behavior
      maxSpeed - - float - max speed of the character
      time - - time to scale velocity and orientation

    • clipSpeed

      public void clipSpeed​(float maxSpeed)
      Method that clips the velocity to not exceed speed
      Parameters:
      maxSpeed - - max speed of GameObject

    • mapToRange

      Map to range.
      Parameters:
      r - - rotation
      Returns:
      float

    • randomBinomial

      public static float randomBinomial()
      returns a random binomial. Math.random() returns a number between 0 and 1; thus this method returns a number between -1 and 1.
      Returns:
      float

    • asVector

      Returns:
